items.text: similar line and length, blocked
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Tharanga, no run

items.text: backs away and opens the face for a cut but gets tucked up and beaten
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Tharanga, no run

items.text: pushed uppishly to extra cover as a fuller one stops on him a little
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Tharanga, no run

items.text: short of a length, opens the face for a punch through backward point
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Dickwella, 1 run

items.text: short of a length, drifts down leg and gets too big on him as well to make contact with the tuck
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Tharanga, 1 wide

items.text: cuts in from a back of a length and he squeezes it away through short third man after rushing back
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Tharanga, 1 run

items.preText: Kushansri: "Why can't tharanga rotate the strike? Is he struggling there? They need to rotate the strike.. singles needed... "
items.text: short of a length, opens the face to guide to point
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Dickwella, no run

items.text: full outside off, driven to mid-off
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Dickwella, no run

items.text: short of a length outside off, opens the face and runs it down to third man
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Dickwella, 1 run

items.text: shout for leg before. Not given. Mashrafe thinks and thinks and thinks and finally his arms swing up to conjure up the review signal. Looks like this may miss leg considerably. It has beaten the flick and the ball has cut in significantly from a short of a length. Ball-tracking is taking a while. Wickets missing, and unlike last time, Bangladesh lose their review
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Tharanga, no run

items.text: slides in towards off with the arm, makes some room and stabs to point
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Dickwella, no run

items.text: full, curving in a lot more sharply on middle, blocked
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Dickwella, no run

items.text: comes down the track and wristily whips a length ball to long-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Dickwella, 1 run

items.preText: Chamika: "Tharanga taking his time, i dont see anything wrong with that. He can up the strike rate at anytime once set. "
items.text: fullish length, opens the face and steers through the covers
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Tharanga, 1 run

items.text: this one looks close and has been given. Dickwella almost immediately signals for the review, and rightly so, because this curved into him. Comes on at too full a length to do anything significant after pitching. Comes on with the arm to hit the pad. But hang on, there's an inside edge and the decision is overturned
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Dickwella, no run

items.text: full on off, driven down to long-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Dickwella, 1 run

items.text: slashes at a wide delivery to covers
items.postText: Anuruddha: "@Chamika : Only if he doesn't perish prematurely.."
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Dickwella, no run

items.preText: Gaja: "@Chamika His strike rate and past doesn't suggest that. He will waste more deliveries and gets out soon. Taking time doesn't mean not rotating strike. It is almost 15 overs and still taking time? "
items.text: length on middle, flicked to midwicket
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Dickwella, no run

items.text: short of a length, cuts in, chops into the surface as he opens up for a big slash
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Dickwella, no run

items.text: short, wide, stabbed to point after getting on top
items.postText: didu: "@chamika also as dickwella is striking at good rate. so tharanga's role can also be considered to be keeping one end."
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Dickwella, 1 run

items.text: short of a length on off, backs away and opens the face to drop to point
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Tharanga, no run

items.preText: eddie: "What's the pitch like today, after some more low-scoring affairs? Bad bowling or good batting?" Not your typical 300 surface. A bit two-paced and some variable bounce. Will be a hard graft for the batsmen
items.text: hangs back and opens the face to steer it fine behind square on the off side. Brilliant save at the third man boundary as the fielder runs and dives full-length to his right
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Tharanga, 1 run

items.preText: Here comes Mahmudullah after the break.
items.text: fullish length, clipped to square leg
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Tharanga, 1 run

items.text: advances down the ground and punches into the off side
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Dickwella, no run

items.text: advances and flicks, chips it in the air but well to the left of the bowler. Again the two-paced nature of the surface coming to the fore
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Dickwella, no run
